body: This is the start point of the Author just spit out filler Books, for what we've seen so far when Himawari finally the Dominator we'll see a lots of good stuffs but i doubt that will be anytime soon, or worse, ever.

When your still waiting for book 12 xD..
Ish oki..i bet uts gonna be good if it does come out
I really wanna see what happens next I hope book 12 comes soon

The first book could start when they had their first kiss but instead of them getting interrupted they keep going and chinatsu kindly but agressively and intensely guides akari through what to do when people make love. Or how she says practice who could call it practice one or something. Love your work hope you read my comment sorry it's so long.

The chinatsu x akari series could be about them practicing and you could have chinatsu and akari fall in love with each other more and more throughout the books and have their practicing become more and more loving and caring.
Love your work also can you make a chinatsu x akari series  and a Kyoko x Ayano one shot keep up the great work can't wait for chapter 12.
